spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout distortion. The entire left-side kitchen and balcony structure is misinterpreted into a messy open bedroom/living hybrid. The central dining area layout is lost, and the proportions of the hallway/thresholds are heavily warped.

structural_fidelity.notes: Walls are visible and roof is removed, but significant hallucinations occur in wall placement (E4). Some walls are jagged or disconnected. It successfully avoided text/UI elements and utilized a neutral background.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is low-poly but placement is largely random compared to the floor plan. The central dining table is missing, and kitchen fixtures are replaced with abstract blocks.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High adherence to style constraints. Excellent low-poly execution, flat shading, and isometric camera angle. Lighting is soft and appropriate for the requested style.

detected_errors.description: Missing kitchen counter assembly and central dining table sequence.
Severe layout distortion of the left wing; balcony merged into interior space.
Hallucinated jagged wall segments and misplaced furniture units not present in 2D plan.
